title: FS: Lot of 24 Low Grade T212 Obak - Types 1, 2, 3
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 24 Low Grade T212 Obak - Types 1, 2, 3
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T212 Obak cards available for sale. All of these cards are obviously very low grade. Still, some are difficult low population cards and tough to find in any condition.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

CARDS PICTURED:

McCredie (borders trimmed off) - $50
